title: How do I connect my B1 to another phone?
answer:
Because your B1 always automatically reconnects the deviceit has connected to before, you need to perform the following steps if you wantto connect your B1 to another phone:
1.        Turn off Bluetooth in the nearby phones thatonce connected to your B1, or delete the B1 Bluetooth information on thephones.
2.        Press and hold the side button for 5 seconds toturn off your B1. Press and hold the button again for 3 seconds to turn it backon. Then the Bluetooth icon starts to blink, indicating that Bluetooth isavailable now.
Turn on Bluetooth on thephone you want your B1 to be connected to. The phone will search for anddisplay the nearby Bluetooth devices. Touch Huawei B1 to connect your B1 to the phone.
